storyInfo: Haze's appreciation of 'kitties' is plain to see. On account of your trust, she's willing to tell you more stories concerning her and the 'kitties.'

attributes.content: 'Kitties.'
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: 'Kitties,' of all shapes and sizes.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: How to put it, meow...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Let's suppose, from tip to tail of town, out came cute little things... hm, and let's also assume you like cute things.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: They'll appear by your side, without warning or whisper.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But they'll only wander into your life on some certain day.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Kitties aren't like people. They won't cozy up to you just because you're so upstanding, and they won't abandon you just because you're some petty thief.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Are there kitties who bask in the sun in coffee shops? There are. Black kits who give night guards a scare when they flash by? Yes.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Even in jail, jail so stunningly strict... kitties can still tiptoe right in, and leave without a hair out of place.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Oh, I might just really love them. No matter which kitty it is, I can feel just how they feel. I don't want to get up. I'm hungry. It's warm. You know whatâ€”I'd like to play a prank.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Everything is a kitty's whim.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: How could a person ever learn to be as easygoing as a kitty? Kitties don't ever band up to bully a single cat.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Ah. They're not like livestock or housepets. Don't think of keeping kitties, or shutting them in.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I hear tell that anyone who'd want to hurt a kitty, in the end, would never even find a single one.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: ...Haze, Haze!
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Meow?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: You're okay, right?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Mmn... Was I off saying things again just now?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: You suddenly ducked down muttering something, and then you wouldn't say anything at all, like you'd fallen fast asleep.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: My, my, this hat is incorrigible, scaring people by raving lunatic and arcane. It does abâ€”solutely nothing to fit my style.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit said that when Operators display this sort of loss of self-conscious response, we have to report it to Medical straight away...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Oh, I'm fine, I'm fine meow. I wouldn't be caught dead on those bloody infirmary beds. The kitties by my feet are just too adorable, and I couldn't help losing myself in loving them.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Haha. There's always so many kitties around Mousse, that's why.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: And what a mewtiful thing! For absolute kitty-addicts like me, Mousse becomes an indispensable part of life...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Heheh, they're all so kind. That's why they've been protecting me since I was back in Victoria...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: ...Haze?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: (She's in another daze...)
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Haze?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: ...Miss Haze!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Myah! ...I'mâ€”I'm alright.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: What's weighing on your mind, Haze? You've been paying extra attention to our surroundings since a bit ago.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: (Whisper) Câ€”Could it be a scent? Has something dangerous sneaked into the Rhodes Island base?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: It's not, I just... happened to notice woman of distinction passing by.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Woman of...?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Distinction...?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Ah! You mean Ms. Christine? I didn't detect her at all.
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: It's clear to see while all the kitties around gather in the plaza to bask and frolic, Ms. Christine doesn't seem one bit taken by it.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Ms. Christine is a very self-determining kind of kitty. She prefers quiet, lonely places.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Now that we mention it, that sounds familiar. You usually love playing about with us, but in front of Ms. Christine, you turn all quiet.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Because... there's a deep, very familiar sense of respect living in Ms. Christine. I can't help it when I gaze at her.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Could it be, you've met Ms. Christine before, Haze?
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: How could an escapee like me hope to know a kitty of her status? No, it'sâ€”her manner, graceful, unhurried, self-pleasing. Not one bit unlike some 'benefactors' who aided me in the past.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Are you talking about...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Well, well... a bygone tale already, is it... myah-hah-hah, this hat's off on its crazed ramblings again. Steals away my attention without notice if I'm not careful.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Mm! Mousse, Mint, treat all of that jabber as my joke!
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But I know there's no joke here.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: To anyone else, a fugitive like me is just as good dead or alive... some might even curse me.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Society has the type who find joy in evaluating other people's worth. Being bullied by them is far from new for me.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: It was harder than you'd believe to escape that prison... my sickness hit me worse and worse.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But in catching this nuisance of a disease, I caught an absurd, hitherto unpossessed hope too, the capacity to put my Originium Arts to full use...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: With the catch that at first, it did absolutely no good.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Once they all saw the cuts only an Infected could have, even the nicest baker's lady wouldn't pass a crumb of old bread onto me.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I had a mind to use the power of my Arts to strike up terror in those shopkeepers' hearts... but then it slipped far out of my control, and blew straight through an entire neighborhood's worth of houses.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: That kind of barbarous strength could never take me back to my normal life in Victoria. I understood that inside and out.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But, well, you know horrid 'nuisances' like me could be dead or alive to anyone else...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: If even my own self turns a blind eye to my life, what other need is there to be alive?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Howeverâ€”I wouldn't like to die.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I spent such a tremendous amount of effort to escape that prison by the skin of my teeth, and yet I found not one person in the whole of Victoria who had any concern left for me, any willingness to accept me...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Not even... a sliver of charity to give.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Look at me, in that state. Imagine if I'd never met 'it.' If I'd never met 'them.'
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I was near to forgetting why I bothered with my escape in the first place.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: My, have mew been standing here for long, Doctor?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.options: You taking a stroll just like the 'kitties'?

attributes.content: Hah-hah. I'm shirking exactly nothing. It's a break between shifts right now, and my stroll has the right to go anywhere it wants.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Doctor, did you know? When you care too much about something, it's all too easy to let the important things slip you by.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: This pen from your pocket, for example. Could I have the honor of using it for a day?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Let me say upfront: I'm not trying to hide anything under the covers here. I'm just plainly, simply greeting you face-to-face. Right, plain and simple.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Ah. See, Ms. Christine's noticed your scent too. She's taken an even higher-up ceiling strut to rest on.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Meow? Yes, that's right, I was staring at Ms. Christine a moment ago.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I just stopped in my tracks to admire her. Observing from beyond, at a distance that won't put her on alert. Up until you passed by, Ms. Christine and I were getting along like a house on fire.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Hm? Why don't I try chit-chatting with Ms. Christine, is it?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: There once was a kitty with quite a resemblance to Ms. Christine who, back in my Victorian days in hiding, came to my help.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Gave me food to eat, offered me clothes to huddle in, led me to dingy little alleyways and warehouses where I could hide from the hunt for me...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: After some time, when I'd finally learned a little Arts, I wanted to find that kitty again. Repay it, you know.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I'd gotten such splendid food in comparison, such warm clothes I'd pilfered to offer it, and all it ended in was my forsaken, lonely exit from the streets.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: *sigh*... Doctor, why is a raven like a writing desk? Why must we meet at three in the afternoon? Why do perfectly decent people take the fall for the awful, and why does misfortune prey on good people?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Why... am I unable to live as a kitty does?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.options: Haze...;My unjust past isn't your fault.

attributes.content: Hah-hah... meow unbecoming of me, Doctor.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: That certainly wasn't Haze grumbling to you. If you were just subject to someone rattling strange things off at you, it's alright now.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: That moody, depressing little scamp. I choked the life out of it myself only a meowment ago.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: If Iâ€”If Haze loved whining so much, then she would've loooooâ€”ong, long ago crumbled under the weight.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But sheâ€”I've been through everything, followed my heart for everything, came to Rhodes Island holding my faith in myself dear.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: That's quite the extraordinary feat to pull off, isn't it? Myah-hah-hah.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Well, then, have your pen back. *yawn*â€”It's about time I find a nice spot to sway my tail and have a nice sleep...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Mreow? Yaahâ€”!
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Ah! I found Haze!
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Haze, are you okay?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Oh, it was just a trifle. Simply wasn't looking and fell right down. No need to worry, Mint, Mousse, Doctor.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Knew itâ€”you love running off to hide every time there's a health checkup. The Medic Operators tasked us to take you with us to the consultation room, or bust!
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Tsk... it's so cruel to make me stare down the state of my own health.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Haze?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: No, it's alright. I suppose it's good of Rhodes Island's doctors to keep some form of privacy. Let's take a siesta for a while first, before we visit that dreadful, disinfectant-stinking room.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Buâ€”But you almost fainted a moment ago...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Look at that, I have Mint and Mousse with me too. You won't be one bit late carrying me over after I faint for real.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: And the Doctor's right here as well.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Noâ€”canâ€”doâ€”! Health maintenance is incredibly important! Um, though we don't really qualify as 'healthy' people...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Leave the meat of the lecture until after we find those adorable little kitties, and have ourselves a proper group lie-down. Mousse, where have those kits gone to rest today?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Hm? I-If I had to guess, probably in the Garden...
attributes.name: Mousse

attributes.content: Then time's of the essence. Let's convene the kitties right now and tour around the Garden together!
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Ah, Doctor, you're still here.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: As you can see, I'll be taking a nice, lazy afternoon nap, getting a pre-departure physical exam done and dusted, and then I'll report in with my team, and we'll start today's acts of 'chivalry.'
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Coming from a former thief and a criminal on the run, it might be quite ironic to hear.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But, Doctor, as far as I'm concerned now, this is quite nice.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: As things stand, my strange little self somehow has battles to fight for the sake of saving others, and thus the chance to be approved of by more and more people...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Doctor, you're not like those once-adorable twice-adored kits, and versus one of refined manners and a concern only for her own freedom like Ms. Christine, you're a world apart.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I just can't make heads or tails of you... but I know that here and now, you're partial to frolicking about with me, and willing to entrust missions to me with proud and confident airs.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: If you ask me, having earned that much from you makes me absolutely content.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Myah-hah-hah, that's what you wanted to say, wasn't it, you lunatic little hat? So long, meow revoir!
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Meow.
attributes.name: Ms. Christine

attributes.options: Afternoon. Still here, then, Ms. Christine?

attributes.content: Meow!
attributes.name: Ms. Christine

attributes.options: That kid just now, she really likes you.

attributes.content: Yes, rather than my 'liking' kitties, it might be better to say I revere them.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Or, perhaps... envy them.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: It's an envy which, at some times, compounds my frustrations.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Ah, humanity... always this way. Any one of its desires coming about can carry unforeseeable dangers. Pay a shred of attention less, and you'll cause yourself to fall into the straits of distress.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: That said... never anticipate a kitty's actions based on your own dear wishes.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: They're kitties. Free, merry, lucky, ill-omened, saddened kitties.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: What's more important is they do as they please, come and go unfettered, with none of those complicated human social devotions. They simply enjoy life, full stopâ€”
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: After all, what could people ever hope to demand from a kitty?
attributes.name: Haze
